metadata.name: Character Archetypes (Rare Ones Expansion)
metadata.description: Uncommon and distinctive character archetypes for fairy tales

liminal_figures.text: The Threshold Guardian who appears human but exists to test worthiness at crossroads
The Twilight Merchant who trades only during the transition between day and night
The Bridge Keeper who knows every traveler's true destination better than they do
The Season Straddler who lives half the year above ground and half below
The Echo Collector who gathers words never meant to be heard

knowledge_bearers.text: The Cartographer of Forgotten Places who maps locations that exist only in memory
The Pattern Reader who sees connections between seemingly unrelated events
The Dream Archivist who catalogs and interprets collective dreams
The Keeper of Discarded Names who remembers what everyone else has forgotten
The Translator of Silent Languages who understands what objects and places would say

transformed_beings.text: The Partially Restored who remains half-transformed after an incomplete spell
The Voluntary Exile who chose to become something other than human
The Composite Being made from parts of different creatures but with a unified consciousness
The Seasonal Shifter whose form changes with each solstice and equinox
The Echo of Someone who exists as an impression left behind by a departed person

burden_bearers.text: The Collector of Sorrows who absorbs grief from others but cannot release their own
The Promise Keeper bound by oaths made by ancestors generations ago
The Debt Inheritor who must repay what others borrowed from magical forces
The Secret Vessel containing knowledge too dangerous to be spoken aloud
The Curse Diluter who takes portions of others' curses upon themselves

paradoxical_figures.text: The Blind Seer who perceives truth precisely because they cannot see appearances
The Immortal Seeker of Death who cannot die but helps others find peaceful endings
The Benevolent Trickster whose deceptions ultimately reveal deeper truths
The Wealthy Beggar who possesses treasures no one else recognizes as valuable
The Eloquent Mute who communicates profound ideas without speaking

boundary_crossers.text: The Dream Walker who can enter and influence others' dreams
The Memory Thief who can extract and collect specific memories from others
The Between-Worlds Child raised in multiple realms simultaneously
The Time Skimmer who experiences moments out of sequence
The Shadow Borrower who can temporarily take on aspects of others

catalysts.text: The Unintentional Prophet whose casual words always come true in unexpected ways
The Fate Tangler whose presence causes improbable coincidences
The Gift Giver whose presents always transform the recipient's life
The Question Asker whose inquiries reveal truths people hide from themselves
The Spark Carrier who inadvertently awakens dormant magic in others
